text.section: Each bicounty commission shall adopt regulations relating to lobbying of that bicounty commission.
At a minimum, the regulations adopted by a bicounty commission shall be similar to the provisions of Subtitle 7 of this title.
Each bicounty commission shall submit to the Ethics Commission a copy of its regulations relating to lobbying.

Each bicounty commission shall:
prepare an annual report on the lobbying before the bicounty commission and regulation of that lobbying by the bicounty commission; and
submit the report to the governing body of each county in which the bicounty commission conducts its operations.
